name: Pitch Black (Retr027, CyborgCabbage, LemmieSix, Starbit)
description:
Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick to move

Click / Square to dash into a ball

===============================

How to play:

Score into the yellow goals - they alternate after very score!

Stay within the light - lingering within the darkness isn't a good idea!

Overtime, lights will fade away, kicking zombies will spawn and barrels will appear blocking your way - watch out!

===============================

How many goals can you score?
